text: Almir de Souza Serra (12 July 1946 – 5 May 2017), better known by his stage name Almir Guineto, was a Brazilian sambista, singer-songwriter and instrumentalist. He worked in the genres of samba and pagode. He was born in Rio de Janeiro. Guineto died on 5 May 2017 in Rio de Janeiro from complications of chronic kidney disease and diabetes, aged 70.Sambista Almir Guineto morre aos 70 anos no Rio ==References== ==Other websites== *SóSamba *Cliquemusic *Cliquemusic Category:1946 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Brazilian singer-songwriters Category:Singers from Rio de Janeiro Category:Writers from Rio de Janeiro Category:Musicians from Rio de Janeiro
title: Almir Guineto
